Survey Popup Demo

This page demonstrates the embeddable survey popup widget. The popup should appear automatically in the bottom-left corner after 2 seconds.

Features

  • Name and Email form fields with validation
  • Responsive design that works on all devices
  • Configurable positioning (bottom-left, bottom-right, top-left, top-right)
  • Auto-show with configurable delay
  • Customizable title and styling
  • Form submission handling
  • Web component architecture for easy embedding
  • JavaScript API for programmatic control

How to Embed

Add this single line to any website to embed the survey popup:

<script src="survey-popup-loader.js"></script>

With Custom Configuration:

<script src="survey-popup-loader.js" data-title="Customer Feedback" data-position="bottom-right" data-delay="5000"></script>
